pkgmetadata.longdescription: Complete Discrete Fourier Transform (DFT) and Periodogram // Calculate the predictive discrete Fourier transform, complete discrete Fourier transform, complete periodogram, and tapered complete periodogram. This algorithm is based on the preprint "Spectral methods for small sample time series: A complete periodogram approach" (2020) by Sourav Das, Suhasini Subba Rao, and Junho Yang.
